questions.question_text: Which two valid effects are used to deal with images within a rule for trusted images? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AB
【たぶん】
A. Deny
B. Alert

Selected Answer: B
【たぶん】
B. If option "--user" is used, it is mandatory to use option "--password."

Selected Answer: A
For sure it's not C, as the --address flag is required. Out of rest of options, A seems to be the correct one, as the rest is false

choices.A: If options are listed after the image name, they will be ignored.
choices.B: If option "--user" is used, it is mandatory to use option "--password."
choices.D: Option "--output-file" cannot be used in conjunction with option "--details."
choices.C: If option "--address" is unspecified, all images are scanned.

questions.question_text: What occurs with the command twistcli when scanning images?
Which statement applies to optimization of registry scans with version pattern matching?

choices.C: It is best practice to always optimize registry scans for faster results.
choices.A: It requires Linux images to rely on optimizing registry scans due to various Linux elements.
choices.B: It is only necessary in registries with tens of thousands of repositories and millions of images.
choices.D: It is rarely successful in the Windows Operating System (OS).

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct. 


"only use version pattern matching for deployments with very large registries containing tens of thousands of repositories and millions of images"

Selected Answer: A
Easy, A correct

questions.question_text: What is the creation and change of public cloud services managed in a repeatable and predictable fashion?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
【たぶん】
D. Prisma Cloud ships all vulnerability policy with a default alert for containers, hosts, and serverless functions.

choices.D: Prisma Cloud ships all vulnerability policy with a default alert for containers, hosts, and serverless functions.
choices.C: The default vulnerability policy rule has an alert threshold to critical.
choices.A: Policy rule order has little impact on optimization.
choices.B: Prisma Cloud scans images in all containers immediately upon policy activation.

questions.question_text: Which statement reflects the default vulnerability management policy?
